attr.title: Null Drifter
attr.desc:
Null Drifter is a 1BIT LO-FI shooter, a journey into the void inside a computer simulation!
Lose yourself in this frenetic yet chill experience!

A Minimalistic twin-stick shooter!
A Simulation for space-fighter pilots!
Made to train them to defeat the awakened forces of the void!
Secretly part of the “Project Starship” World, used by the poor 4 souls of “Project Starship X”, before embarking for their mission: defeating the army of Cthulhu!
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from Steam.
From your Steam Library, Right-Click Null Drifter > Manage > Browse local files
Copy the data.win into ports/nulldrifter/gamedata
